name: StSegmentElevationMyocardialInfarctionStemi
title: St Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction (Stemi)
description: Diagnosis history of STEMI events (Business ID: Entry 2409041)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing St Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction (Stemi).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an diagnosis history of stemi events.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD10CM codes for St Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction (Stemi).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating St Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction (Stemi).)
